snippet.title: Chess Club Valley
snippet.description:
Get this game on:
Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/2498830/Chess_Club_Valley/

Chess Club Valley is a 2D Open-World Chess RPG.

Experience this epic chess adventure for the first time across an action-packed overworld filled with character’s, monsters and hidden secrets. Explore the dangerous underworld dungeon’s where you must battle the Super Bosses in chess. Talk to engaging character’s with unique personalities and play chess against them to level up your XP. A total of 20+ hours of gameplay!

FEATURES

- The first 2D Open-World Chess RPG.
- Journey through an action-packed overworld.
- Explore dungeon’s to battle Super Bosses in chess.
- Level up by interacting with personality-filled characters.
- Charming pixel art along with 8/16-bit inspired music.
- A total of 20+ hours of gameplay.
- Gamepad Support.
